p: Lipid-soluble antioxidants found in taro have been identified by HPLC. Vitamins and carotenoids, among them ascorbic acid, violaxanthin, lutein, β-carotene, δ-γ-α-tocopherol, and δ-γ- tocotrienol are responsible for protecting cellular structures against lipid peroxidation caused by free radicals ( Table 3) [ 41, 51, 62].
